summary: A cocky German fighter pilot is shot down over England in 1940 and makes numerous attempts to escape to fight again.
cast: Hardy Krüger|Colin Gordon|Michael Goodliffe|Terence Alexander|Jack Gwillim|Andrew Faulds|Julian Somers|Alec McCowen|Harry Lockart|Robert Crewdson|George Mikell|George Roubicek|John Van Eyssen|Frederick Jaeger|Richard Marner|Paul Hansard|John Adams|Gerald Andersen|Arthur Bentley|Victor Brooks|Adrian Cairns|Edward Cast|Robert Cawdron|Cyril Chamberlain|Peggy Ann Clifford|Jan Conrad|Reed De Rouen|Robert Dorning|Anthony Faramus|Lee Fenton|Michael Golden|Celia Hewitt|George Hilsdon|George Hirste|Lindsay Hooper|Bernard Horsfall|Glyn Houston|Arthur Howell|Stratford Johns|Charles Morgan|Al Mulock|Etain O'Dell|Robert Raglan|Fred Real|Michael Ripper|Norman Rossington|Anthony Sagar|Jack Silk|Jeff Silk|Fred Stroud|Jack Taylor|Reg Thomason|Graham Tonbridge|Robert Vossler|Ben Williams|Frank Williams
director: Director: Roy Ward Baker (as Roy Baker)
title: El único evadido
